devicePage.name: _instance

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_cursw
binaryOption.toolTip: This bit specifies if the current sources of electrode oscillator and reference oscillator are swapped

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_stm
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects between software and hardware triggers

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_stpe
binaryOption.toolTip: Controls operation while in Low Power Modes (STOP, VLPS, LLS and VLLS{3,2,1})

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_tsiien
binaryOption.description: Touch Sensing Input Interrupt Module Enable

intOption.name: tsi_gencs_nscn
intOption.toolTip: Number of Consecutive Scans Per Electrode

choiceOption.name: tsi_gencs_extchrg
choiceOption.toolTip: These bits indicate the electrode oscillator charge and discharge current value

choiceOption.name: tsi_gencs_refchrg
choiceOption.toolTip: These bits indicate the reference oscillator charge and discharge current value

choiceOption.name: tsi_gencs_mode
choiceOption.description: TSI analog modes setup and status bits
choiceOption.toolTip:
Set up TSI analog modes
 Mode[3..2] == 00 => Capacitive sensing mode
 Mode[3..2] != 00 => Noise detection mode
 When reading this field will return the analog status.

choice.name: Single threshold noise detection without frequency limitation
Single threshold noise detection with frequency limitation

binaryOption.name: tsi_gencs_esor
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects between End-of-Scan or Out-of-Range Interrupt

devicePage.template: \tstatic constexpr uint32_t tsi_gencs = \ \t TSI_GENCS_CURSW($(tsi_gencs_cursw)) | // Electrode/Reference OSC swap \t TSI_GENCS_STM($(tsi_gencs_stm)) | // Scan Trigger Mode \t TSI_GENCS_STPE($(tsi_gencs_stpe)) | // TSI STOP Enable \t TSI_GENCS_TSIIEN($(tsi_gencs_tsiien)) | // Touch Sensing Input Interrupt Module Enable \t TSI_GENCS_NSCN($(tsi_gencs_nscn)-1) | // Consecutive Scan number \t TSI_GENCS_PS($(tsi_gencs_ps)) | // Electrode Oscillator Prescaler \t TSI_GENCS_EXTCHRG($(tsi_gencs_extchrg)) | // External Oscillator Charge Current select \t TSI_GENCS_DVOLT($(tsi_gencs_dvolt)) | // Oscillator's voltage rails \t TSI_GENCS_REFCHRG($(tsi_gencs_refchrg)) | // Reference Oscillator Charge Current select \t TSI_GENCS_MODE($(tsi_gencs_mode)) | // TSI analogue modes setup and status bits \t TSI_GENCS_ESOR($(tsi_gencs_esor)); // EOS or OOR Interrupt select\n\n

intOption.name: tsi_tshd_thresl
intOption.toolTip: Determines the low threshold for the wakeup channel active in low power mode

intOption.name: tsi_tshd_thresh
intOption.toolTip: Determines the high threshold for the wakeup channel active in low power mode

devicePage.template: \tstatic constexpr uint32_t tsi_tshd = \ \t TSI_TSHD_THRESH($(tsi_tshd_thresh)) | // Low Power Channel Low Threshold value \t TSI_TSHD_THRESL($(tsi_tshd_thresl)); // Low Power Channel High Threshold value\n\n
